title: Polish yeasted doughnuts
ingredients: ['15g compressed fresh yeast', '475ml milk', '80g raisins, finely chopped', '125ml warm water', '4 egg yolks', '1 egg', '100g caster sugar', '50g unsalted butter, melted', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g orange zest', '1 teaspoon salt', '750g plain flour', '2 litres vegetable oil for frying', 'icing sugar, for dusting']
